body_html:
see this Creating threads to prefetch using QueueRunner objects section.

You delete the tf.train.start_queue_runners ,coord and theads from the training code which will start the input queue that the reader need to read from, so you reader will hang there until the queue starts.
body_text:
see this Creating threads to prefetch using QueueRunner objects section.
You delete the  tf.train.start_queue_runners ,coord and theads  from the training code which will start the input queue that the reader  need to read from, so you reader will hang there until the queue starts.
body:
see [this](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/how_tos/reading_data/index.html) Creating threads to prefetch using QueueRunner objects section.

You delete the  `tf.train.start_queue_runners` ,`coord` and `theads`  from the training code which will start the input queue that the `reader`  need to read from, so you `reader` will hang there until the queue starts.
